page.title: Netgear Orbi Wall Plug Satellite (RBW30) Gen2

revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Netgear |model=Orbi Wall Plug Satellite |revision=RBW30 (Gen2?) |asin=B06XKC6V2X;US; |newegg=N82E16833122944 |fcc_date=02/23/2018 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf= |manuf_model= |availability=now |type=range extender |fcc_id=PY317400403 |pcb_id= |pwr_v=100-240 |pwr_amp=0.2 |pwr_ac_hz=50-60 |cpu1_brand=Qualcomm |cpu1_model=IPQ4019;Q, IPQ4019, 0VV, NK6184TN, K061800; |cpu1_cspeed=710 MHz |cpu1_cores=4 |fla1=256 MiB |fla1_brand=Spansion |fla1_model=S34ML02G200TFV00 |ram1=256 MiB |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model=NT5CC128M16IP-DIH |wi1_chip1_brand=Qualcomm |wi1_chip1_model=IPQ4019;Q, IPQ4019, 0VV, NK6184TN, K061800; |wi1_chip2_brand=Qualcomm |wi1_chip2_model=IPQ4019;Q, IPQ4019, 0VV, NK6184TN, K061800; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi2_chip1_model=QCA9886;Q, QCA9886, 0VV, NK623C6V, K062304; |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_none=true |addl_chips= |flags=Wave2, MU-MIMO, DFS, |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=password |oui= }}
:• '''866Mbps''' - 2-stream 802.11ac backhaul (433Mbps per stream), :• '''866Mbps''' - 2-stream 802.11ac device (433Mbps per stream), :• '''400Mbps''' - 2-stream 802.11n 2.4GHz channel (QAM-256) = '''''2200 Mbps'' class'''
{{TagLine|Orbi High-Performance AC2200 Tri-Band WiFi Wall Plug Satellite}} '''802.11ac Two-Stream Wave2 WiFi plus Dedicated Two-Stream Wireless Backhaul''' :{{ProductPage|https://www.netgear.com/orbi/rbk30.aspx}} {{SupportPage|vendor=Netgear|model=rbw30}} When compared to the [[Netgear Orbi Wall Plug Satellite (RBW30)]], this updated version has the bluetooth circuitry removed as described in the [https://fccid.io/PY317400403/Letter/Expedited-Review-Approval-Letter-3750404 Expedited Review Approval Letter]. Most of the details for this device are copied from the original RBW30. {{FCC ST|08/22/2018|indexme.}} :[https://www.netgear.com/orbi/rbk30.aspx Netgear Orbi Kit (RBK30)]: *[[Netgear Orbi Router (RBR40)]] *[[Netgear Orbi Wall Plug Satellite (RBW30)]] ===Product features=== *Dedicated two stream 802.11ac wireless backhaul ===See also=== *[[Netgear Orbi Router (RBR50)]] - [[Netgear]] ''Orbi Router'' • [http://www.netgear.com/home/products/networking/orbi/ PPage] :[[Qualcomm]] IPQ4019 (Dakota) 2x 2T2R, QCA9984 (Cascade) 4T4R AC *[[Netgear Orbi Satellite (RBS50)]] - [[Netgear]] ''Orbi Satellite'' • ''Orbi Kit (RBK50)'' :[[Qualcomm]] IPQ4019 (Dakota) 2x 2T2R, QCA9984 (Cascade) 4T4R AC *[[Netgear Orbi Router (RBR40)]] - *[[Netgear Orbi Satellite (RBS40)]] - *[[Netgear Orbi Wall Plug Satellite (RBW30)]] - *Netgear Orbi WiFi System ([https://www.netgear.com/orbi/rbk50.aspx RBK50]) - AC3000 (RBR50 + RBS50) *Netgear Orbi WiFi System ([https://www.netgear.com/orbi/rbk40.aspx RBK40]) - AC2200 (RBR40 + RBS40) *Netgear Orbi WiFi System ([https://www.netgear.com/orbi/rbk30.aspx RBK30]) - AC2200 (RBR40 + RBW30) __NOTOC__
